title: Do Rioters Read Memes And Games?
body:
If so..............~~NERF CAMILLE~~


Kidding! Here take a GIF https://media.giphy.com/media/gm80RYSj6Uss8/giphy.gif


Hello riot take my thresh-votes {{champion:412}} {{champion:412}} {{champion:412}} {{champion:412}} {{champion:412}} {{champion:412}} {{champion:412}} {{champion:412}} {{champion:412}} {{champion:412}} {{champion:412}} {{champion:412}} {{champion:412}} 




Sorry for this annoying meme...

replies.body: why did riot release that skin? kog does not need to be a pretty butterfly.

> [{quoted}](name=Happy Honker,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=suhn9phM,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2017-01-18T20:44:45.852+0000)
>
> why did riot release that skin? kog does not need to be a pretty butterfly.

it isnt about what he needs m8. its about what he wants

Maybe it's not what he needs, _maybe_…

It's _maybelline_

reported
Dancing Kog is the best kog besides....all the other kogs that aren't dead.
I don't recommend posting like a moderator.
that gif was clutch this wouldnt have been able to be in memes and games otherwise
